project_abstract.cdata: The Local Initiatives Project's primary objective is to assist groups in Bosnia & Herzegovina to restart economic activities and make the transition from dependence on humanitarian assistance to active employment. The project's secondary objectives are to jump start the establishment of financially viable microcredit institutions, to provide feedback to the Government and support business environment improvement. The project will consist of the following components: a) microcredit programs; b) microfinance capacity building; and c) project management.
